metadata.title: CVE-2023-52859 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:perf: hisi: Fix use-after-free when register pmu failsWhen we fail to register the uncore pmu, the pmu context may not beenallocated. The error handing will call cpuhp_state_remove_instance()to call uncore pmu offline callback, which migrate the pmu context.Since that's liable to lead to some kind of use-after-free.Use cpuhp_state_remove_instance_nocalls() instead ofcpuhp_state_remove_instance() so that the notifiers don't execute afterthe PMU device has been failed to register.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
